entry.title: Beauty Best Sellers Make Up Set
entry.s:vendor: Typsy Beauty Procurement Services Pvt. Ltd.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty Procurement Services Pvt. Ltd.
Type: Makeup Combo
Price: 1949.00

Typsy Beauty’s Beauty Bestsellers set, includes our trendsetting pH-activated Lip & Cheek oil along with our iconic Silk Cushion Blush-liter wand. Look flawless with our most iconic products in a single set. Save more when you buy sets.  

The set contents: 

  • Shade Shifter Lip & Cheek Oil, pH-enomenal 01 (6.4g): A groundbreaking color-changing lip and cheek oil, that magically changes colour from clear to pink, thanks to it’s innovative pH-reactive formula. Infused with nourishing Acai Berry and Hibiscus oil, it provides hydration, to lips while giving cheeks a naturally flushed & dewy radiance. 

  • Silk Cushion Blush, Strawberry Champagne 01 (5ml): A buildable, blendable cream-liquid blush-liter, with a convenient, easy-to-use viral cushion-tip applicator for precise application and silky texture. Just dot and blend this lightweight pigment-packed blush onto cheeks for lasting radiance.

entry.title: Limited Edition PR Box: Glossified Lip Plumper
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Glossified
Price: 3649.00

Get your hands on the Viral PR Box Everyone's Obsessing Over on Instagram!

Perfect for gifting: Chic, luxurious, and irresistible—this set is the ultimate treat for beauty lovers.

Typsy Beauty Glossified Lip Plumper Gift Set: This multitasker combines the nourishing benefits of a balm, the volumizing effects of a plumper, and the glossy finish of a gloss. It has a unique melting fondue texture that comes all the way from Korea! It leaves your lips looking irresistibly juicy with mirror-like shine and gives them the perfect pouty plump without burning.

What makes it so goood?

1.  Melting fondue Texture: The thick, rich texture melts on your lips to create a shiny, hydrated juicy look

2.   Deep Hydration: Enriched with ester oils, it delivers intense moisture, leaving your lips feeling  soft, smooth, and supple

3.   High Shine: Delivers a dazzling, mirror-like finish that enhances your  lip with a beautiful, mirror like shine

4.   Instant Fullness: Infused with gentle plumping agents, gives your lips a fuller, more voluminous look without the discomfort #noneedleplump

5. Long-term Benefits: Regular use helps improve lip texture and firmness, enhancing your natural lip contour over time

6. No filters, No fillers needed for the perfect pout 

7. Made in Korea 

100% vegan & Cruelty-free.

entry.title: Sculpt & Glow Gift Set
entry.s:vendor: Typsy Beauty Procurement Services Pvt. Ltd.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty Procurement Services Pvt. Ltd.
Type: Silk Cushion
Price: 1899.00

The two hottest selling products from Typsy Beauty’s iconic silk cushion range come together to create the most versatile face products. The contour wand makes face sculpting a breeze with its innovative silk cushion tip applicator to give a strong chiseled look to cheek  bones and jaw lines, whilst the blush wand can be used to add a pop of radiant colour to the apples of the cheeks. The set comes in a beautiful box that that’s ideal for gifting.  

The set contents: 

• Silk Cushion Blush, Bouquet of Roses 02 (5ml): A buildable, blendable cream blush with a convenient, easy-to-use viral cushion-tip applicator for precise application and silky texture. Just dot and blend this lightweight pigment-packed blush onto the high points of the cheeks for lasting radiance.  

• Silk Cushion Blush, Maple Syrup 05 (5ml): A blendable cream-based contour wand with a convenient cushion tip applicator to easily chisel and scult the face. Ideal for contouring cheek bones, nose and jawlines.  Just dot and blend this lightweight pigment-packed contour to the areas where desired.

entry.title: Plump & Shine – Lip Kit Duo
entry.s:vendor: Typsy Beauty Procurement Services Pvt. Ltd.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty Procurement Services Pvt. Ltd.
Type: Glossified
Price: 1599.00

A twin set of Typsy Beauty’s most premium melting glosses, the made in Korea formula with soft fondue texture glides onto lips effortlessly while plumping the lips, and filling in lines to give you model-worthy fuller lips with mirror-like shine. 

The set contents:  

  • Glossified Lip Plumper, Cherry Blossom 01 (2.7g): Inspired by the famous Cherry Blossoms of Korea, this pink shimmer shade flatters all skintones. Swipe onto lips once for a sheer gloss look or build with two or three swipes for a deeper,  pigmented look.  

  • Lip Plumper, Bubble Tea 03 (2.7g): A nod to the bubble tea culture that originated in Korea, this nude brown shade is ideal for Indian skintones. Swipe onto lips once for a sheer gloss look or build with two or three swipes for a deeper,  pigmented look.

entry.title: Limited Edition PR Box: Pout Polish Lip Treatment Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Pout Polish
Price: 3499.00

Get your hands on the Viral PR Box Everyone's Obsessing Over on Instagram!

Perfect for gifting: Chic, luxurious, and irresistible—this set is the ultimate treat for beauty lovers. 

Typsy Beauty Pout Polish Lip Balm Gift Set: It’s the ultimate fusion of skincare and makeup. This innovative lip treatment balm combines the hydration of a lip mask, the shine of a lip glaze, and the power of advanced skincare, all packed in one. Along with a lip case for phone cover to carry your lippie everywhere you go! 

Each shade is inspired by delicious desserts, delivering a unique, delightful scent that leaves you wanting for more! It is formulated in Italy, with highly targeted lip Peptides and Collagen and comes with a moisture lock technology that forms a protective layer over the lips, keeping them hydrated for up to 8 hours.

What makes it so goood?

Metal Tip Applicator: Gives a refreshing, cooling experience with every swipe 

Triple Action Formula: Combines the hydration of a lip mask, shine of a lip glaze, and nourishment of lip treatment balm 

Science-Backed Ingredients: Peptides and collagen hydrate, soothe fine lines and add plumping effect 

Non-Sticky High Shine: Gives a glazed look without any stickiness, leaving your lips with a radiant, high-shine finish 

Comfortable, lightweight Formula: It cocoons your lips in a non-greasy, bouncy moisture that wears comfortably all day 

Moisture lock Technology: Provides up to 8 hours of comfort, and hydration 

Dessert-Inspired Scents: Each balm is crafted with dessert-like scents for a truly indulgent experience 

100% Vegan & Cruelty-free. Dermatologically Tested

entry.title: Hydra Lip Trio – Mini Lip Oil Set
entry.s:vendor: Typsy Beauty Procurement Services Pvt. Ltd.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty Procurement Services Pvt. Ltd.
Type: Lip Oil
Price: 749.00

Typsy Beauty’s 3 top-selling lip oils combined in a single set! Why get just one, when you can have them all? The mini sized packing makes them ideal for handbags and travel.  

The set contents: 

  • Mini Shade Shifter Lip & Cheek Oil, pH-enomenal 01 (1ml): A groundbreaking color-changing lip and cheek oil, that magically changes colour from clear to pink, thanks to it’s innovative pH-reactive formula. Infused with nourishing Acai Berry and Hibiscus oil, it provides hydration, to lips while giving cheeks a naturally flushed & dewy radiance. 

  • Mini Shade Shifter Lip & Cheek Oil, Midnight 02 (1ml):  This universally flattering, 2-in-1 multifunctional pH-powered lip & cheek tint shifts like magic into a custom berry-pink shade, while drenching skin in lasting non-sticky, juicy colour and shine. Infused with Goji Berry and Blackberry, for instant nourishment.  

  • Mini Hi Honey! SPF 25 Lip Oil – Gold 01 (1ml): This hydrating lip oil not only shields your lips from sun damage with SPF 25 but also deeply nourishes and moisturizes, leaving them with a plump, glossy shine. Infused with a unique blend of Mirsalehi Honey and vitamin E, it combats free radicals and promotes healing.

entry.title: Colour Riot, 6-in-1 Nailpolish Kit

Indulge in a riot of vibrant colours with this set of Typsy Beauty Coupled Up Nail Polishes. Each Nailpolish has a unique double-sided design that allows you to play with more colours. Mix and match your nailpolish with this unique 6-in-1 nail polish set.   

The set contents: 

  • Coupled Up Nail Polish, Aries 01 (10ml): Powered by gel technology that glides on smoothly, each nailpolish has 2 complementing shades that ensure salon-quality nails in no time thanks to the quick-dry formulation. Achieve long-lasting, flawless results right at home.  

  • Coupled Up Nail Polish, Cancer 04 (10ml)
